name: Missions Report
query:
select l.employee as 'كود الموظف::120', l.employee_name as 'إسم الموظف::300', 
l.employee_job as 'الوظيفة::150', l.employee_department as 'الإدارة::150', l.from_date as 'التاريخ::100', l.direction as 'الجهة::200', 
l.description as 'ملاحظات::300', l.from_time as 'من وقت::120', l.to_time as 'إلى وقت::120'
from `tabLeave Application` l
where l.docstatus=1 and l.status='Approved' and l.leave_type_type='Mission'
and ((l.from_date>=%(from_date)s and l.from_date<=%(to_date)s) or 
(l.to_date>=%(from_date)s and l.to_date<=%(to_date)s))
and l.employee in (select name from `tabEmployee` where company=%(company)s and business_unit=%(business_unit)s)
order by from_date,employee
